Regulation Name(s): Respiratory viral panel multiplex nucleic acid assay
Instrumentation for Clinical Multiplex Test Systems
Specimen Type(s): Nasal swab eluted in viral transport media
Nasopharyngeal swab eluted in viral transport media
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for ID NOW Influenza A & B 2 rapid molecular assay using isothermal nucleic acid amplification for detection of influenza A and B RNA
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative detection and discrimination of influenza A and B viral RNA in nasal or nasopharyngeal swabs and corresponding transport media from patients with respiratory infection symptoms, as an aid in differential diagnosis in conjunction with clinical and epidemiological risk factors.
